properties.title: Arosa Untersee
properties.abstract: What families are usually looking for at the sea, they can find in Arosa 1800 metres above it! Here they can spend their time on a beautiful sandy beach.
properties.description:
Traditionally, only men swam in this lake. The colder one, the Obersee, was reserved for women! Today things are a little different. The Untersee has everything to offer all the family. Along with a beautiful beach there is a solar-heated paddling pool. There is also a lawn and sun deck to lie on.

Tip - Since 1947 a very successful sports tournament has been held at the lake. The 10 disciplines completed by competing teams, provides spectators with a lot of fun.
properties.name: Arosa Tourismus
